TopicTitle: Is there a way to see a vessel's (or part of a vessel's) mass from within the VAB?

Articles.Content: I feel like this is a really basic concept, but I'm having trouble finding such an add-on from the mod library. Any help?

Not one, but three popular add-ons that I know can display the vessel mass in VAB/SPH:

- Kerbal Engineer Redux;

- MechJeb;

- VOID.
Excellent, I've been considering trying out KER, and this clinches it. Much obliged.
One thing you can do is put your craft on the launchpad and then go into map view and press the info button on the right side of the screen to see your vessels mass. This works in stock ksp
